scripts.build:dir: rm -fr dist && mkdir -p dist/js dist/css dist/fonts dist/img
scripts.build:f7-font-assets: rsync -a node_modules/framework7-icons/css/ dist/css/ && rsync -a node_modules/framework7-icons/fonts/ dist/fonts/
scripts.build:www-assets: rsync -a src/html/* dist/ && rsync -a src/css/ dist/css/ && rsync -a src/img/ dist/img/
scripts.build:browserify: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify -p [ vueify/plugins/extract-css -o dist/css/build.css ] -e src/main.js > dist/js/build.js
scripts.build: npm run build:dir && npm run build:www-assets && npm run build:f7-assets && npm run build:f7-font-assets && npm run build:browserify
